abstract: Bank of America chief executive Ken Lewis hasn’t given any signs that he plans to leave soon — but he certainly put the issue of succession on the table.
snippet: Bank of America chief executive Ken Lewis hasn’t given any signs that he plans to leave soon — but he certainly put the issue of succession on the table.
lead_paragraph: When Bank of America announced Monday’s management shuffle, Kenneth D. Lewis, the bank’s chief executive, said the changes “position a number of senior executives to compete to succeed me at the appropriate time.”

abstract: John Arnold, the former Enron star trader who has made huge sums running Centaurus Advisors, told the Commodity Futures Trading Commission that stronger limits on energy trading positions would hurt the markets, not help them.
snippet: John Arnold, the former Enron star trader who has made huge sums running Centaurus Advisors, told the Commodity Futures Trading Commission that stronger limits on energy trading positions would hurt the markets, not help them.
lead_paragraph: John D. Arnold, a former star trader at Enron who is now an energy hedge fund billionaire, made a rare public speech on Wednesday in which he strongly opposed the idea of imposing limits on trading positions in the energy futures markets.

headline.main: Energy Trading Mogul Warns on Trading Limits
